nodes.text: Nichen was a planet found in the Outer Rim Territories. Kettemoor jumped to this location after its encounter with the Teljkon Vagabond.

The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Nichen system, and therefore the planet Nichen, in grid square N-4. The Essential Atlas Online Companion repeated that information on the system's location. However, the document also placed the system within the Morshdine sector, which it depicted as lying in grid squares O-4 and O-5 only, with other systems assigned to that sector being placed strictly within those two squares.
